questions.question: Which of the following virtualizations move storage and network IO out of the hypervisor and enable lower overhead and bare metal instances?
What is the maximum number of availability domains in an Oracle Cloud region?
Which of the following statements is true?
options: All OCI regions are a single AD region
Each availability domains consists of three fault domains
Each fault domain consists of three availability domains
Availability domains are isolated from each other
questions.correct_answer: Each availability domains consists of three fault domains

questions.question: A company has developed a web application in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. What should they do to ensure that the application has the highest level of resilience?
options: Deploy the application across multiple Virtual Cloud Networks.
Deploy the application across multiple Availability Domains and Fault Domains.
Deploy the application across multiple Availability Domains and subnets.
Deploy the application across multiple Regions and Availability Domains.
questions.correct_answer: Deploy the application across multiple Availability Domains and Fault Domains.

questions.question: Which of the following protocols does Fastconnect use for the exchange of routing information?
Which of the following represents the IP address range within the network 192.168.2.0/25?
True or False: Local Peering Gateway is required to connect two VCNs within a region?
Which gateway can be used to provide internet access to the workloads deployed in a private subnet of a VCN?
Which of the following represents the amount of free outbound data transfer in an OCI tenancy?
State whether the statement is True or False: BGP is a Static routing protocol.
Which of the following can be used to connect a customer on-premise network to Oracle Cloud?
Which of the following is the default username created on a compute instance created from Oracle Linux/CentOS?
State whether the statement is True or False: Bare Metal Servers are used for performance intensive workloads.
State whether the statement is True or False: By default, block volumes are read-only.
Which of the following OCI storage services is used to store unstructured data?
Which of the following OCI storage services is used for storing data that is seldom accessed, but requires long retention periods?
Which of the following doesn’t represent the default NFS export options while creating a File System?
Which of the following is not a use case for File storage service?
State whether the statement is True or False: The File Storage service encrypts all file system and snapshot data at rest.
Which of the following represent the features supported by object storage?
options: Pre-authenticated requests for accessing the object without credential
Multipart upload for a single object
Lifecycle rules to automatically archive or delete objects after a specified number of days

questions.question: Which one of the following statements is false about object storage?
options: Minimum retention requirement for Archive Storage is 30 days
Ideal for storing an unlimited amount of unstructured data
Offers two distinct storage classes, “hot storage” and “cold storage”
Employs 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES-256) to encrypt object data
questions.correct_answer: Minimum retention requirement for Archive Storage is 30 days

questions.question: State whether the following statement is True or False: Object storage supports private access from Oracle Cloud Infrastructure resources in a VCN through an Internet Gateway.
Which among the following is not a protocol supported in the OCI load balancer?
Which among the following are common load balancing policies in OCI?
State whether the following statement is True or False: Storage Gateway can be used as a general purpose Network Attached Storage server.
Which among the following is not a way to transfer data from customer on-premise to Oracle Cloud?
Which among the following protocols is used by application servers for connecting to the OCI object storage through storage gateway?
Which of the following is not one of the versions for Exadata database?
Which among the following represents the correct metrics used for the pricing of a VM based Database on OCI?
Which of the following is the default port used by Autonomous Database?
You want to leverage a managed RAC offering in OCI. Which managed DB service would you choose?
Which of the below statements is false about Autonomous Database?
options: Supports connectivity via SQL*Net, JDBC, ODBC
On-demand scaling is not supported for Autonomous Database
Oracle Autonomous Database can be deployed in 2 ways – dedicated and serverless
Supports Oracle Cloud Services such as Analytics Cloud Service, GoldenGate Cloud Service, Integration Cloud Service, and others
questions.correct_answer: On-demand scaling is not supported for Autonomous Database

questions.question: How many pre-defined service names are configured in tnsnames.ora for a single Autonomous Transaction Processing database instance, and what are they called?
options: Two - They are ATP and ADW.
Three - They are high, medium and low.
Five - They are tpurgent, tp, high, medium and low.
None - There are no pre-defined service names in tnsnames.ora.
questions.correct_answer: Five - They are tpurgent, tp, high, medium and low.

questions.question: Which of the following is not one of the use cases for DataSafe?
True or False: Data Masking is necessary to analyze what types of data are present in the database and what are the sensitive data.
Which of the following is not a characteristic of user activity auditing?
options: Provision audit, compliance, and alert policies
Collect audit data from databases, and track sensitive operation
Collect audit data from databases, and track sensitive operation

questions.question: Which of the following is not one of the supported DNS records for OCI DNS Service?
Which of the following is the DNS server that takes website names or URL requests from users and checks the records obtained from authoritative DNS servers for the associated IP address?
True or False: Default NS and SOA records are automatically generated when a Zone is created.
True or False: Conditional steering can be used for zero rating services so that preferred ASNs can be directed to free resources while all other traffic can be directed to paid resources.
Which of the following is not the common use case for DNS Traffic Management?
Which of the following is not one of the components of the Health Checks service?
True or False: OCI WAF uses OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (CRS) to protect against the most common web vulnerabilities.
True or False: OCI WAF cannot protect the workloads against a missing function-level access control vulnerability.
Which of the following is not the common use case for OCI WAF?
options: Bot management – dynamically blocking bad bots
Protection against layer 7 distributed denial-of service (DDoS) attacks
Protect against cross-site scripting (XSS) and SQL injection, activities

questions.question: Which of the following is a resource manager job type?
Which Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) service can you use to create and manage your infrastructure?
Which of the following represents the job lifecycle state?
Which of the following represents the maximum duration for which messages are retained in an OCI streaming service?
What rules allow you to deliver events to certain Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services? (Choose all correct answers)
True or False: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Events enables you to create automation based on the state changes of resources throughout your tenancy.
What is the maximum memory threshold for Oracle functions?
When starting a container to run Oracle functions, the container runs processes as which user?
options: Oracle functions use the same OCI user to run any process inside the container with no added privileges.
Oracle functions use fn user to run the process inside the container with no added privileges.
Oracle functions do not use any default user, it’s the responsibility of the admin to specify one.
Oracle functions use root to run any process inside the container.
questions.correct_answer: Oracle functions use fn user to run the process inside the container with no added privileges.

questions.question: What is the maximum execution timeout for Oracle functions?

A DevOps engineer wants to push an image to OCIR and that image needs to be tagged appropriately so it identifies the docker registry where the image needs to be pushed. Which of the following will be added to the image tag?
Which of the following docker commands is not required for saving an image to OCIR?
Which of the following is required to login to the OCIR Container Registry?
True or False: Kubernetes cluster worker nodes should be placed in a private subnet of the VCN.
Which of the following statements is incorrect about the Oracle Container Engine for Kubernetes (OKE)?
options: Quick create option for Kubernetes cluster creates VCN, NAT Gateway and Internet Gateway along with Kubernetes cluster and worker nodes
Worker nodes in node pool can be of different shapes
It is possible to scale up the number of nodes in a node pool
You have to only pay for the worker nodes; you do not need to pay for the master node
questions.correct_answer: Worker nodes in node pool can be of different shapes

questions.question: Which of the following is not a method to create a Kubernetes cluster?

You have created a new compartment called PRODUCTION to host some Production apps. You have also created users in your tenancy and added them to a group called 'Production_Group'. Your users are still unable to access the PRODUCTION compartment. How can you resolve this situation?
options: Write IAM policy for each specific user granting them access to the production compartment
Write an IAM Policy for Production Group granting it access to production compartment
Your users get automatic access to all compartments. No further action needed
Every compartment you create by default gets a certain set of policies. No further action is needed
questions.correct_answer: Write an IAM Policy for Production Group granting it access to production compartment

questions.question: True or False: After a key vault is deleted, it cannot be recovered.
You can Filter Costs by which of the following? (Choose two)
OCI Budgets are used to achieve which of the following? Choose the two best options.
options: Track actual and forecasted spending for the entire tenancy or per compartment
Suspend the account upon exceeding budget threshold
Do not allow creation of additional resources
Set alerts on your budgets at predefined thresholds to get notified
correct_answers: Track actual and forecasted spending for the entire tenancy or per compartment
Set alerts on your budgets at predefined thresholds to get notified

questions.question: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure SLA covers which of the following? (Choose three)
True or False: You must have a Valid CSI and Support Account in order to submit a Service Request
Where will you find your Customer Support Identifier?
options: Tenancy Details Page in OCI Console

questions.question: When customers deploy their workload on OCI, they are responsible for which of the following? (Choose three)
options: Isolation of compute, Virtual cloud network
User credentials including strong password, password renewal, secure user access to OCI
correct_answers: User credentials including strong password, password renewal, secure user access to OCI

questions.question: Which of the following design principles deploy, operate, and use your applications securely in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure? (Choose all correct answers)
options: Implement the principles of least privilege and separation of duties
Protect data at rest and in transit
Understand the shared security responsibility model
